text: Siviriez is a municipality of the district Glâne in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. == History == On 1 January 1978, the former municipalities of Villaranon and Le Saulgy merged into the municipality of Siviriez and on 1 January 2004 the former municipalities of Prez-vers-Siviriez, Villaraboud and Chavannes-les-Forts merged into Siviriez.Nomenklaturen – Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 4 April 2011 == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Municipalities in Glâne
title: Siviriez
